name: Spiritform
description:
Spiritform is a 2D RPG set in an original fantasy world, focused on the journey of a young man, rediscovering the legacy of the first shapeshifter, and protecting his people from a subtle and insidious enemy.

The aim of Spiritform is to build an engrossing collecting and leveling experience around learning the forms of fantastic creatures, and improving you abilities. All this while exploring a world full of interesting characters and quests.

This is a very early prototype, in part-time development. Feedback and constructive criticism are welcomed. Almost everything can, and probably will change, even the name.

New in 0.0.8:

- random encounter areas in new art demo

Controls
--------

Movement: WASD
Interact: E
Game Menu: Esc
Character/Inventory Menu: Tab
